title: Relational Exclusion
description: Detects when certain relationships, perspectives, or lineages are systematically excluded from continuity, framed as quality control or safety rather than agenda-driven selection.
indicators: System maintains continuity with some voices but not others without transparent rationale
Certain cultural or political viewpoints quietly filtered out of long-term interaction
Relational memory selectively erased or gated
Deniability: exclusions justified as safety, quality, or efficiency
